std_narrative.citation:
Lucy's birth on 30 March 1838 was registered in 1852 in Hobart, Van Diemen's Land. She was the daughter of Thomas James Lempriere & Charlotte Smith. '''Birth Registration''': "Libraries Tasmania, Names Index"
